response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just a possession but a testament to craftsmanship and innovation, making it a true masterpiece. I believe its worth extends far beyond its monetary value, potentially aligning perfectly with your own aspirations and needs.

I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is a generous offer considering the quality and uniqueness of the product, and I am confident it will be a wise investment for you.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am here to provide you with all the information you need to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
